duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform manual and clerical duties related to shipping, receiving, storing, issuing, and delivering a variety of materials, equipment, and supplies.
Conduct physical counts of inventory and pack products for shipments.
Transport materials between departments, facilities, and/or production floor. Transact inventory/material movements in an accurate and timely manner.
Operate warehouse vehicles such as forklifts, pallet jacks, and related material handling equipment in narrow aisles and cold storage facilities.
Follow federal and international regulations regarding hazardous substance transportation and assure accurate counting, staging, and storage of materials and supplies.
Participate in the effective training of other employees and carry out duties in compliance with established business policies.
Perform other duties & projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Forklift certification required.
